body.name: Yoni Essential Oil for Women Set of 3, 100% Natural Feminine Oil Intimate Deodorant for Women, Eliminates Odor and Ph Balanced, Feminine Serum Made with Pure Natural Essential Oils (1 fl oz/30 ml)
features: ✿【Soothing & Moisturizing】The hydrating benefits of feminine oil coupled with the omega-6 fatty acids found in safflower yoni essential oil sprays help keep your skin and vaginal moisturized, the yoni essential oil spray is ingredients work together to deeply moisturize, nourish and soften.

✿【Ph Balanced】Different from other hygiene products for women our's yoni oil is natural which we don’t use any harsh chemicals making essential rose oil spray safe to use for all skin types. To help you feel refreshed and smell fabulous, our feminine vaginal oil blend will help promote balanced ph along with leaving behind a subtle refreshing scent.

✿【Improve Yoni Elastivity】This yoni oil is rich in antioxidants and provides effective relief from dryness, itch and mal odor resulting from workouts and menstruation while also promoting skin tone / elasticity and eliminating odor, sweetening your sacred with the fresh and clean fragrance.

✿【Organic Yoni Oil】 For your daily Vaginal health and optimal hygiene needs. The natural essential oils helps maintain Ph levels; deodorizes, soothes skin; ease discomfort, irritation, and itchiness; and keeps your V smelling fresh, and helps with Irregular cycles and menstrual pain.

✿【All For Women】Yoni essential oil for woman is 100% organic, hypoallergenic moisturizer spray that can help combat symptoms of BV, and menopause. The ingredients were carefully selected for their time-tested effectiveness in gently treating feminine issues like vaginal dryness, irritation and itchiness.
body.description: ✿Yoni Essential Oil is a feminine care specially developed to refresh and care for your intimate area every day. It helps to keep the microflora of the skin of your intimate area in a healthy balance by maintaining the natural PH. ✿Usage: Apply 2-3 drops to clean hand and apply to clean female intimate part or apply directly to your panty liner or pad. ✿Features & Benefits You’ll Love: ☞- This hydrating essential oil blend locks the moisture in place helping you feel fresh all day ☞- Promote skin elasticity and reduces visibility of sagging skin and wrinkles ☞- Helps reduce the visibility of signs of aging and promote smoother skin ☞- It can easily be incorporated into your daily care routine without any special preparations

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: These oils work perfectly for me. The scents are nice not too much. Used it after my cycle especially and it made me feel a lot more comfortable. Used it before those intimate moments and my bf was totally into the moisturizing effect down there. I have been reordering. These are a favorite for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars too good and for the low
reviews.reviewText: not only do they smell amazing ( i love the honey dew and strawberry like it actually has a good nostalgic strawberry scent) but they feel good and the ingredients are very basic i sometimes even add it to my hair products. whoever made these deserve a mansion and all the pleasure in the world i do not care i love them (the prods and the maker)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First of all the scents are AMAZING strawberry being my favorite. I do appreciate the natural scents because of my sinuses. I am very sweaty in my intimate area and I like no odour down there as natural as that may be. If your odour isn't associated with bv,yeast or any other vaginal infection this product will do you good in terms of personal hygiene.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the subtle smell and it doesn't leave you greasy down there. Gonna have fun on my birthday

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasts all day
reviews.reviewText: This product is great! Keeps you fresh all day even when the temperature is sweltering! Big girl friendly! S little goes a long way. Not crazy about the peach scent but it still does its job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They are all the same
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these and they all smell the same. I thought I was buying different scents. Oh wait I did. But I got all the same scents. I think too much oil was used. Not a fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I actually really love these they are worth way more nice size bottle beautiful smell and texture I thought we could put it inside for sticky lol but it’s oil rub some in and good to go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not recommend.
reviews.reviewText: I got this and i used it a couple times until it made my parts hurt and itch so bad i could not bare it. The scents last about 6-8 hours the first time you use it, but after that the scent stays for maybe an hour at most.
